description: AI-powered customer profiler that predicts ideal customer personas
name: Customer Profiler
long_description:
Generates detailed customer profiles (personas) based on your business idea using AI.

How to use:
- Describe your business idea
- Get 3 detailed customer personas
- Includes demographics, pain points, motivations, and preferred channels

Perfect for:
- Market research
- Marketing strategy
- Product development
- Business planning
short_description: Generate detailed customer personas from your business idea using AI
